transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Hello. Ha Komal Prasad Pandey baat kar ha Komal Prasad Pandey baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ha sir. Sir jaise ki abhi aapne bol rahe the, theek hai. Main apni team se baat kar lunga iske liye, theek hai. Jo bhi hoga resolution aapko main update kar dunga, theek hai. Aur is koi service se related koi issues ho aap bataiye sir. Main isko resolve karne ke liye sir.
Customer: Service mein kya hum improvement kar sakte hain jaise service apni chal rahi hai usme koi buylead vagera ka koi cheeze ho, vo bataiye.
Customer: Lead ka bhi problem aa raha hai yaar lead jaisa chahiye vaisa nahi milta hai.
Executive: Ah like kis product se related aapko buylead chahiye bataiye sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Bataiye kis product se jyada buylead chahiye aapko?
Customer: Ek minute aapka aawaz break ho raha hai. Ek minute ha. Ek minute hold karo.
Executive: Ha ha theek hai.
Customer: Jo aapka product apna product hai turmeric mein?
Executive: Ha ha main dekh raha hun sir. Ha ha main sun raha hun sir.
Customer: Usme jo bulk bulk mein jo lead chahiye vaisa nahi aa raha hai vo.
Executive: Sir dekhiye abhi main.
Customer: Aate hai.
Executive: Ha main dekh raha hun sir. Sir meri request.
Customer: Ha bulk ki hi main bata raha hun aapko. Abhi 35 minute pehle aayi hui hai Bangalore Karnataka se, theek hai. Turmeric finger double polish, theek hai. Ye buylead hai ab 30 ton ke liye hai order value 10 lakh se 20 lakh hai, theek hai. Aap contact buyer now pe click kijiye.
Customer: Nahi aa rahi hai. Likha toh phir kabhi aapne but har din vaisi lead nahi aati hai kabhi kabhi ek aanda ek aanda ek aanda aati hai vo.
Executive: Sir abhi tak main jitna bhi dekh raha hun, theek hai turmeric se related hi buylead hai aur koi 10 lakh 5 lakh lakh se neeche hume buylead dikhi nahi rahi hai. Aap khud dekh lijiye portal pe. Just open kijiye portal.
Customer: Main quantity mein main main main isme bolta hun tonnage mein bol raha hun main tonnage mein. Kyunki 5 kg, 2 kg, 1 kg aisa nahi aa raha hai vo aise isme toh dil nahi karte hain hum toh.
Executive: Nahi nahi 1 kg, 2 kg ke liye abhi toh mujhe nahi dikh rahi hai. Abhi ke taur pe main dekh raha hun sir. 1 kg, 2 kg ki nahi dikh rahi hai. Phir bhi jab bhi aapko aisa issues aaye aap bulk ka filter hota hai, theek hai. Bulk ka filter lagaiye vahan pe contact buyer now pe click kijiye, theek hai. Ah buylead aapko dikh jayegi, theek hai. Sorry bulk ka filter lagaiye vahan pe aapko jo product ki chahiye vo product ki aapko bulk mein dikhne lagegi. Aur jo sabse pehle jyada quantity ki hai vahi buylead aapko dikhegi jab bulk ka lagayenge. Aur dusra hai order value ka bhi option hum log diye hain, theek hai. Above 1 lakh, 50,000, 10,000, theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm. Ye bhi diye hue hain toh ye aap kar lijiye, theek hai. Dekh raha hun sir bahut sari buylead aap lips ho ja rahi hain aap consume bhi nahi kar rahe hain. Jaise aapka main activity dekh raha hun toh pure month mein aap lagbhag 19 din active rahe hain last mein dekh raha hun main. Aur jo
Customer: Buyer ki calls aati hai vo bhi.
Executive: Buyer ki.
Customer: Ha. Buyer ki call toh hum accept karte hain but jo payment ka jo issue hai na vo sort out vo nahi ho raha hai na uski vajah se thoda lead consume karna.
Executive: Sir dekhiye hamari team us pe main aapko bata raha hun hamari team us pe work kar rahi hai. Thoda sa aap bhi jo bhi apne taraf se karna chahiye, theek hai. Vo bhi kariye, theek hai. Jisse hum dono log aapas mein support hoga toh dono log us pe vo karenge. Jahan tak mujhe update mil raha hai client ke taraf se yahan dekha hun mail bhi gaya hai usko, theek hai client ko sari cheeze gaya hai hamari Nidhi mam thi jo past experience dikhai de raha hai ek second rukiye Nidhi thi kaun thi jo dekh rahi thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jo hamari buyers team ki vo thi, theek hai. Vo aapko proper coordinate karti rahi, theek hai. Har ek cheez unhone aap se jo bhi cheeze ho sakta hai.
Customer: Unhone notice bheji thi kya ki seven days mein seven days mein likha tha but buyer ne kuch usme response nahi kiya na abhi tak.
Executive: Ha toh sir ye buyer ka.
Customer: Aapke paas.
Executive: Nahi mere paas aisa kuch nahi.
Customer: Aapke paas kuch response aaya hai kya kuch? Mere paas kuch response aaya nahi uska isliye main puch raha hun ki dobara usko notice vagera kuch bhejna hai toh bhej do. Jo bhi cheez hai.
Executive: Uske liye main Nidhi ji se ek baar personally main baat kar leta hun.
Customer: Maine maine reminder mail bhi dala tha aur request bhi dali thi but abhi tak Nidhi ka bhi koi uske upar reply nahi aa raha hai aur kuch nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Aur hamare jo advocate hai unko bhi maine directly likha tha. Unko CC mein rakhe hain. Koi bhi reply nahi kar raha hai uske upar.
Executive: Achha. Theek hai. Reply toh karna chahiye na mail ke upar at least.
Executive: Theek hai main bol lunga main se baat kar lunga is baat se thoda sa kya cheeze hain vo aapko connect kar lenge, theek hai. Jo bhi cheeze hoga ha. Aur sir toh ye jo hai ticket ye mere upar raise hui hai toh ye main close kar sakta hun jo aapne 9696 kiya hai.
Customer: Ha vo kar sakte hain close uska koi uska koi problem nahi mujhe. Vo thoda lead ka vagera thoda setting karwa do aisa kuch chahiye toh.
Executive: Vo lead ka main ha theek hai lead aayegi aapko lead maine dikhaya bhi hai aap consume karna chahe toh consume bhi kar sakte hain usko buylead ko, theek hai. Is koi aise buylead se related koi bhi issues aate hain aap turant mujhe call kijiye main 24 ghanta 9 am se 6 pm tak aapke sath rahunga jo bhi issues aayenge vo main resolve karunga service se related koi bhi cheeze hongi, theek hai. Vo thoda legal team se thoda unko boliye legal team se.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ha main bol dunga usko, theek hai. Aur hamari feedback ke liye jayega closure main kar raha hun feedback ke liye jayega us pe agar maine achha diya hoga aapko suggestion toh vo kar dena, theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay okay ya. Hmm hmm hmm okay ya ya thank you.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai aur koi concern hai sir ye do cheez ke alava aur koi concern hai. Theek hai. Nahi nahi nahi. Theek hai main aap se request karunga buyer ki calls aap miss mat kijiye buylead jyada se jyada active kari rahiye, theek hai. Product kuch product hai jo jisme dealing aap ek second rukiye main bata de raha hun.
Executive: Line pe rahiye.
Executive: Jaise turmeric powder hai sir. Iska product aap dal nahi rakhe ho isko main dal dun product turmeric powder isme dealing karte hain sir aap?
Customer: Ha karte hain na karte hain dalo.
Executive: Turmeric powder ek jagah dala hua hai lekin single polish Salem turmeric Gonda turmeric powder. Gonda matlab Gonda koi brand hoti hai sir?
Customer: Vo turmeric mein rehta hai ye gattu bolke aata hai.
Executive: Ha? Ye Gonda se aati hai kya Gonda?
Customer: Nahi nahi vahi rehta hai ka ek.
Executive: Achha achha achha. Turmeric ka vahi gatta bolke khata hai vahi aata hai.
Executive: Ha theek hai main isko ek baar sahi kar deta hun turmeric ka single polish na, theek hai turmeric powders ho. Turmeric products bhi hain turmeric products mein kya kya aate hain jaise aapne dal rakha hai single polish Salem turmeric Gonda turmeric powder isme sari cheeze aate hain, theek hai. Koi dikkat nahi hai iska main dekh leta hun ek baar product add kar deta hun iska, theek hai images vagera hogi aap mujhe de dena, theek hai. Main sari cheeze add kar dunga usme ha. Iska price kya hoga turmeric product ka?
Customer: Ha sir? 165 165 kg.
Executive: 165 per kg na?
Customer: Ha ha per kg.
Executive: Ek second aur main puch leta hun isme. Turmeric.
Executive: Ye product mein koi bhi product dal de raha hun main, theek hai. Matlab ye jo aapka dala hua haldi ka, theek hai ek baar aap dekhiye product jo hamare paas hai vo main dal sakta hun. Powder mein hai aur khade vo dal sakte hain sir na. Theek hai. Iska dekhiye variety kaun sa aata hai Salem mein aata hai Rajapuri aata hai lockdown aata hai ya Wigon aata hai kaun sa aata hai black kali Amba white haldi Kocha ya aur koi kaun sa hai sir?
Customer: Rajapuri aata hai ek.
Executive: Rajapuri Rajapuri Salem Rajapuri Salem. Ha ye form mein kaun hai finger mein hai slice mein hai powder mein hai kis mein hai sab mein hai?
Customer: Teenon mein teenon mein sab mein hai.
Executive: Sir teenon mein. Bilkul label.
Executive: Theek hai. Is pe main baat karunga apne team se, theek hai. Ki aapka response jaldi se jaldi de, theek hai sir. Ye hoga iska turmeric finger mein main kar de raha hun, theek hai. Sir ayurvedic ingredient herbs ye bhi hai kya? Turmeric powder mein.
Customer: Ah powder mein dete hain na powder ki isme form mein dete hain na.
Executive: Ha main powder mein hi kar diya hun iska category vagera nice, theek hai. Ab jo bhi cheeze hoga aap discuss kar lena bahut sare good jaggery mein aap dealing kar sakte hain sir iska price kya hoga good jaggery?
Customer: Good jaggery ka 50 rupee kg hai.
Executive: 50 kg.
Customer: Kg hmm.
Executive: 50 iska photos image kahan milega sir?
Customer: Image ye mere paas hai nahi. Image hai nahi sir jaggery ka. Jaggery ka aap khali usme add karke ye kar do main image usme dal deta hun kal.
Executive: Theek hai sir koi dikkat nahi hai, theek hai theek hai okay. Theek hai sir koi dikkat nahi hai main ye sari cheeze kar de raha hun. Thoda keyword vagera dekh lo thoda update kar do usme kuch hoga toh.
Executive: Theek hai main keyword usme work kar diya hun, theek hai sir. Koi dikkat nahi isme jitna bhi ho sakta ho sakega utna main kar dunga. Theek hai sir aur jo bhi cheeze hoga vo batana, theek hai sir. Okay okay. Hmm hmm hmm okay ya ya thank you.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs more buyleads in turmeric.

- Payment issues not sorted out.

- No response from Nidhi regarding payment issue.

- Wants leads in tonnage, not in bulk.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution and update.

- Executive explained bulk filter and order value options.

- Executive confirmed team working on payment issues.

- Executive to personally follow up with Nidhi.

- Executive added turmeric powder product to catalog.

- Executive to add product and price for jaggery.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer regarding issues.

- Executive will add product details to catalog.

- Executive will follow up with legal team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, turmeric, payment, catalog, jaggery
